[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.md) &gt; [IPackageData](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.ipackagedata.md)

## IPackageData interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Data type for a package.json file. This is a superset of the full package.json file and includes additional fields that are generated by the plugin, including licenseSource, licenses, copyright, and author.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IPackageData extends IPackageJson 
```
**Extends:** [IPackageJson](./node-core-library.ipackagejson.md)

</td><td>


</td><td>

string \| { name?: string; }


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ The author of the package. This is a superset of the full package.json author field. Grabs either the author field or author.name field from package.json.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[copyright](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.ipackagedata.copyright.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string \| undefined


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** A small string subset which is used for copyright extraction from a licenseSource file.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[licenses?](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.ipackagedata.licenses.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

{ type: string; url: string; }\[\]


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Additional license metadata if present. May contain information about a project which has multiple licenses.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[licenseSource?](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.ipackagedata.licensesource.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ The source of the license file itself used for generating THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.html or custom license files.


</td></tr>
